title: BJP, RSS Not Letting Muslims Vote? No, It’s an Old Video from Guj
subtitle: Fact Check: A viral video claims that BJP, RSS and Shiv Sena are not allowing Muslims to vote. However, the video is from Ahmedabad’s Viramgam town where a clash broke out between two communities.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video on social media claims that the Bhartiya Janata Party (BJP), Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) and Shiv Sena are not allowing Muslims to vote. The claim reads: “ ताजा खबर मुसलमानों को वोट देने से रोक रहे है मोदी सरकार बीजेपी आरएसएस शिवसेना वाले बुड्ढे बच्चे और महिलाओं पर मारपीट कर रहे हैं इस वीडियो को मीडिया वाले शेयर नहीं करेगा इसलिए इस वीडियो को ज्यादा से ज्यादा शेयर करें और आर एस एस और मोदी के खिलाफ कार्रवाई होनी चाहिए”



(Translated: The latest news is that Modi government, BJP, RSS , Shiv Sena are stopping Muslims from voting. The elderly, children and women are being beaten up. Since, the media will not share this video, share it as much as you can. Action should be taken against the RSS and Modi. )
